name: Boulder Rush (itch) (NoAverageJ0E)
description:
Fly your ship to safety and riches. Use boulders to smash barriers and dangerous turrets. Find your way to the exit wehile collecting 3 precious gems.

My first experience making a game on such a short timescale. I had a lot of fun. It's a little rough, but I'm very happy with it. Now I must sleep.

- May the record state that I changed the build at 03:03 in the morning because I decided that I'd upload the one with thr wrong viewing window size.  Recommend playing in fullscreen.
